nodes.text: Sometime between 3647–3642 BBY, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, a clan of Mandalorian warriors attacked the palace of a Hutt whom they believed had signed a death mark against them. The combat medic Archiban Kimble, better known as Doc, had faked the death mark in order to trick the Mandalorians into attacking the Hutt, who had been hoarding medpacs after a recent groundquake. During the fighting, Doc infiltrated the palace and made off with the medpacs, and the battle ended with the death of both the entire clan and the Hutt.

The unnamed Hutt was first mentioned in the conversation "Anonymous" with the Jedi Knight companion character Doc in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
